lom:description.lom:string: This site is very readable. Good information is well illustrated and designed to keep the interest of the learner. An excellent introduction to plate tectonics, and what phenonmena these motions cause. Useful for those wanting to have reading material available for students prior to a lesson on plate tectonics.

This site is based around a clickable map which links the user to discussions of places in the world which display different types of plate motion (subduction, convergence, spreading, transverse). Each of these sites are in turn covered with hyperlinks to various topics.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Subduction, sea-floor spread, convergence, plate tectonics, earthquakes,
